verses.verse: Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that they might bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim<s%>, which is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, even those did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> unto <S%H6440>him<s%>, were with him before the <S%H727>ark<s%>, <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, that could not be <S%H5608>told<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>, into the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3671>place<s%>, even under the wings of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>.

For the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their two <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>poles<s%> there <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And they drew <S%H748>out<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%>, that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> were seen <S%H7200>out<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>, and they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>: and there they are unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>put<s%> there at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3548>pass<s%>, when the priests were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6051>place<s%>, that the cloud <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>live<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.
I have <S%H1129>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> you an <S%H1004>house<s%> to live <S%H2073>in<s%>, a settled <S%H4349>place<s%> for you to stay <S%H3427>in<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: (and all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>;)

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and has with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>, saying,

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be in <S%H977>it<s%>; but I chose <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H3282>Whereas<s%> it was in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, you did <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

<S%H7535>Nevertheless<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; but your <S%H1121>son<s%> that shall come forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of your <S%H2504>body<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6965>performed<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, and I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the room of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%>, and have <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I have <S%H7760>set<s%> there a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%>, where is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, when he brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the presence <S%H5048>of<s%> all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H8064>you<s%>, in heaven <S%H4605>above<s%>, or on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8104>beneath<s%>, who keep <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%>:

Who have <S%H8104>kept<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that you <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H1696>him<s%>: you spoke also with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3068>now<s%>, Lord <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that you <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H7535>so<s%> that your <S%H1121>sons<s%> take <S%H8104>care<s%> to their <S%H1870>way<s%>, that they <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as you have <S%H1980>walked<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

And <S%H430>now<s%>, O God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, let your <S%H1697>word<s%>, I pray <S%H539>you<s%>, be verified, which you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>.

But will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H8064>behold<s%>, the heaven and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> cannot <S%H3557>contain<s%> <S%H637>you<s%>; how much less this <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>built<s%>?

Yet have you <S%H6437>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and to his <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prays<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H3117>day<s%>:

That your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%>, even toward the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which you have <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8085>there<s%>: that you may listen unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>make<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And <S%H8085>listen<s%> you to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>: and <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>: and when you <S%H8085>hear<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>.

If any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>trespass<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> upon him to cause him to <S%H422>swear<s%>, and the <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

When your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be struck <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7725>you<s%>, and shall turn again to <S%H3034>you<s%>, and confess your <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%>, and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto you in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

When <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up<s%>, and there is no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6419>you<s%>; if they pray toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, when you afflict <S%H6031>them<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that you <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> where they should <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon your <S%H776>land<s%>, which you have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

If there be in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%>, if there be <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, <S%H7711>blight<s%>, <S%H3420>mildew<s%>, <S%H697>locust<s%>, or if there be <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%>; if their <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities<s%>; whatever <S%H5061>plague<s%>, whatever sickness there <S%H4245>be<s%>;

Whatever <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> is made by any <S%H120>man<s%>, or by all your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which shall <S%H3045>know<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%>; (for <S%H3045>you<s%>, even you only, know the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>;)
That they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> you all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Moreover concerning a <S%H5237>stranger<s%>, that is not of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but comes <S%H935>out<s%> of a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake;

(For they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, and of your <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and of your stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>;) when he shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to you <S%H5971>for<s%>: that all people of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H5971>you<s%>, as do your people <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which I have <S%H1129>built<s%>, is <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name<s%>.

If your <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against their <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H1870>wherever<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6419>them<s%>, and shall pray unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for your <S%H8034>name<s%>:
Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>.

If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H120>you<s%>, (for there is no man that <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H599>not<s%>,) and you be angry with <S%H5414>them<s%>, and deliver them to the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, so that they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captives<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H7350>far<s%> or <S%H7138>near<s%>;

Yet if they shall <S%H7725>repent<s%> themselves in the <S%H776>land<s%> where they were carried <S%H7617>captives<s%>, and <S%H7725>repent<s%>, and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of them that carried them <S%H7617>captives<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and have done <S%H5753>perversely<s%>, we have committed <S%H7561>wickedness<s%>;

And so <S%H7725>return<s%> unto you with all their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all their <S%H5315>soul<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which led them away <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto you <S%H1870>toward<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for your <S%H8034>name<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>,
